description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A Fantastic Math Party Game where up to 4 players compete in a race against the clock to answer equations in Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division or all of the above. Even Adults will enjoy testing their smarts - Add a tasty beverage for a different kind of Party Game.
